title: Terms and Conditions for Duos App

sections.title: Introduction
paragraphs: Welcome to Duos, an application developed by Marina Gladysheva for Duos AI (also known as Lifter.ai), registered with the Chamber of Commerce under KVK81462549. Duos provides realistic interview practice in a safe learning environment, offering unique challenges with progressive difficulty in a roguelike adventure format.

sections.title: Acceptance of the Terms
paragraphs: By accessing or using Duos, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the service.
This app is intended for users who are at least 16 years old. By using this app, you represent that you are at least 16 years of age.

sections.title: Description of Service
paragraphs: Duos is an AI-powered interview practice platform designed to help users improve their interview skills. The app provides:
a. Simulated interview experiences with AI-powered interviewers
b. Progressive difficulty levels in a game-like environment
c. Personalized feedback and performance analytics
d. Access to professional features through subscriptions
The specific features and functionalities may be updated or modified from time to time at our discretion.

sections.title: User Obligations and Prohibited Activities
paragraphs: As a user of Duos, you agree to:
a. Provide accurate and complete information when creating your account
b. Maintain the security and confidentiality of your account credentials
c. Use the app for its intended purpose of interview practice and skill development
d. Comply with all applicable laws and regulations
You are prohibited from:
a. Using the app for any unlawful purpose or in violation of these Terms
b. Attempting to gain unauthorized access to any part of the app or its related systems
c. Interfering with or disrupting the integrity or performance of the app
d. Reproducing, duplicating, copying, selling, or reselling any part of the app
e. Transmitting any viruses, malware, or other malicious code

sections.title: Privacy and Data Protection
paragraphs: We are committed to protecting your privacy and personal information. Our practices are in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other relevant data protection laws. For more detailed information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

sections.title: User Accounts
paragraphs: a. Account Creation: Users must register for an account to access certain features of the App.
b. Account Responsibility: You are responsible for safeguarding your account credentials and any activities under your account.

sections.title: Credits and Subscriptions
paragraphs: a. Credits: Duos operates on a credit system where credits can be exchanged for mock interviews. Credits are sold in packs.
b. Subscriptions: We offer subscriptions that provide credits periodically and grant access to extra features for professionals.
c. Credit Validity: Credits accumulate and do not expire.
d. Refunds: Refund policies are subject to the terms of the platform through which the purchase was made (e.g., Apple App Store, Google Play Store).

sections.title: Intellectual Property
paragraphs: All content provided on Duos, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of Duos AI or its content suppliers and is protected by intellectual property laws.
By using the app, you are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use the content solely for your personal, non-commercial use in accordance with these Terms.

sections.title: Content Ownership and Licensing
paragraphs: a. User Content: Any content you provide or create within the app (such as responses to interview questions) remains your property.
b. Feedback: Any feedback, suggestions, or ideas you provide regarding the app may be used by us without any obligation to compensate you.
c. App Content: All content provided by Duos, including AI-generated content, remains the property of Duos AI.

sections.title: Updates and Modifications
paragraphs: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of the app at any time without notice. This includes the addition or removal of features, functionalities, or content.
We may require you to accept updates to the app. If you choose not to install such updates, certain features of the app may not be available to you.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
paragraphs: Duos AI will not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use Duos.

To the maximum extent permitted by law, our total liability for any claims under these terms, including for any implied warranties, is limited to the amount you paid us to use the app in the past twelve months.

sections.title: Disclaimers and Warranties
paragraphs: Duos is provided 'as is' and 'as available' without any warranties, either express or implied.
We do not warrant that the app will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free from harmful components.
We make no representations or warranties about the accuracy or completeness of the app's content or the content of any websites linked to the app.

sections.title: Termination
paragraphs: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms and Conditions.
Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease.

sections.title: Security
paragraphs: We implement a variety of security measures to maintain the safety of your personal information. For detailed information about our security practices, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

sections.title: Changes to Terms
paragraphs: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. The updated version will be posted on this page.
Your continued use of the app after any changes to the Terms constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.

sections.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
paragraphs: These Terms will be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Netherlands, where Duos is registered.
Any disputes arising from or relating to these Terms or your use of the Service shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in the Netherlands.
Your use of the Service may also be subject to other local, state, national, or international laws, including the terms and conditions of the Apple App Store and Google Play Store.

sections.title: Severability and Waiver
paragraphs: If any provision of these Terms is found to be unenforceable or invalid, that provision will be limited or eliminated to the minimum extent necessary so that the Terms will otherwise remain in full force and effect and enforceable.
Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights.

sections.title: Feedback and Communication
paragraphs: We welcome user feedback and questions about our service. Users are invited to join our Discord community for discussions and support.
For official communications, please contact us via email at help@duos-ai.com.
